node.title: Book Summary: Growing Object-Oriented Software, Guided by Tests
node.description: I have finally gotten round to reading the famous GOOS book that has been around since 2009. Here is my summary.

node.title: Five Minute Design Patterns #3: The Prototype Pattern
node.description: Another post in my blog post series where I try to cover all of the Gang of Four Design Patterns in five minutes each, once again we have one of the Creational Patterns... the Prototype Pattern!

node.title: Passing your PSM1 & becoming a certified Scrum Master.
node.description: I give you my top tips on how you can pass your Scrum.org PSM1 exam to become a fully certified Scrum Master.

node.title: Five Minute Design Patterns #2: The Factory Pattern
node.description: The second post in my blog post series where I try to cover all of the Gang of Four Design Patterns in five minutes each, this time it's one of the Creational Patterns... the Factory Pattern!

node.title: Five Minute Design Patterns #1: The Builder Pattern
node.description: The first of posts in my blog post series where I try to cover all of the Gang of Four Design Patterns in five minutes each, this time it's one of the Creational Patterns... the Builder Pattern!
